TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit SrgsRuleRef extends System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsElement

summary.span: 表示指定对规则引用的语法元素。

span.span: Represents the grammar element that specifies a reference to a rule.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果要重用已经定义了内容的 元素，则 类特别有用。The class is particularly useful when you want to reuse an element whose contents have already been defined. 通过重复使用现有规则，可以更快地生成复杂的语法。By reusing existing rules, you can build complex grammars more quickly. 如果满足以下条件，则可以使用 类的构造函数之一来引用 对象或 `rule` 元素：You can use one of the constructors of the class to reference an object or a `rule` element if the following is true: - 对象位于包含语法中，其 属性的值 或 。The object is in the containing grammar and the value of its property is or . - `rule` 元素位于外部语法中，并且其 `scope` 特性的值 `public`为。The `rule` element is in an external grammar and the value of its `scope` attribute is `public`. - `rule` 元素位于外部语法中，其 `scope` 特性的值 `private`，并声明为外部语法的 `root rule`。The `rule` element is in an external grammar, the value of its `scope` attribute is `private`, and it is declared as the `root rule` of the external grammar. 此类表示万维网联合会（W3C）[语音识别语法规范（SRGS）版本 1.0](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=201761)中定义的 `ruleref` 元素。This class represents the `ruleref` element as defined in the World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) [Speech Recognition Grammar Specification (SRGS) Version 1.0](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=201761). 有关 ruleref `ruleref` 的详细信息，请参阅 " [" 元素](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/56eb0031-4908-4788-83ab-7c5e19aa4ac0)。For information about the SRGS `ruleref` element and details about its support by System.Speech, see [ruleref Element](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/56eb0031-4908-4788-83ab-7c5e19aa4ac0).

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Dictation As SrgsRuleRef

summary.span: 定义可与与此语法关联的听写主题定义的朗读输入匹配的规则。

span.span: Defines a rule that can match spoken input as defined by the dictation topic associated with this grammar.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Garbage As SrgsRuleRef

summary.span: 定义可与任何语音（到下一个规则匹配、下一个标记、或知道朗读输入结束）匹配。

span.span: Defines a rule that can match any speech up to the next rule match, the next token, or until the end of spoken input.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly MnemonicSpelling As SrgsRuleRef

summary.span: 指示语音输入可以包含单词的拼写的字母，并且拼写的字母可以识别为单词。

span.span: Indicates that speech input can contain spelled-out letters of a word, and that spelled-out letters can be recognized as a word.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Null As SrgsRuleRef

summary.span: 定义在缺少任何音频输入时自动匹配的规则。

span.span: Defines a rule that is automatically matched in the absence of any audio input.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Void As SrgsRuleRef

span.span: Defines a rule that can never be spoken.
